DOC.brief_title: Single Focused Shock Wave Release od Delayed Onset Muscle Soreness ( DOMS )
DOC.detailed_description: Forty-five participant agree participate sign write informed consent . After enrollment , muscle soreness induce participant subsequently randomize receive either ( 1 ) focus extracorporeal shockwave therapy ( Verum ) , ( 2 ) sham shock wave ( Sham ) ( 3 ) treatment ( Control ) . Thereafter , treatment administer , . Measures repeat treatment 24 , 48 72 hour . Main outcome parameter pain intensity rest movement assess visual analogue scale ( VAS ) elbow region non-dominant arm . Secondary outcome include pressure pain threshold ( PPT ) biceps muscle belly , maximum isometric voluntary force ( MIVF ) elbow flexor assess impairment activity daily live . Participants followed-up 72 hour induction Delayed Onset Muscle Soreness .
